_header: My master Bukton when of Christ our king
Subjects: envoys; advice, on marriage; marriage, advice on; marriage, trials of
_description: Geoffrey Chaucer, L’Envoy de Chaucer a Bukton — four 8-line stanzas including Envoy

BodFair16.First Lines:
My maister Bukton whan of Criste our kyngWas axed what ys trouthe
                    or sothefastnesse…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…God graunte yow your lyfe frely to ledeIn fredam for ful
                    harde it is to be bonde

CovAcc3251.First Lines:
MI Master boughton whan Criste oure kingeWas axed what is trouthe
                    or sothfastnesse…
CovAcc3251.Last Lines:
…God graunte you youre life to ledeIn ffreedom for ful harde
                    is to be bonde
